inclusion.criterion: Durie-Salmon stage II or III disease
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Measurable disease in the serum and/or urine
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Scheduled to receive high dose chemotherapy and autologous stem cell transplant for multiple myeloma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Individuals who have previously undergone autologous stem cell transplant are eligible for this study provided more than 6 months have elapsed from the prior transplant.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Minimum stem cell dose of 4x10^6 CD34+ MNC / kg stored for autologous stem cell rescue.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adequate hematologic reserve as evidenced by ANC ≥ 1500/mm3 and platelets ≥ 100,000/mm3.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Serum direct bilirubin ≤ 2.0 mg/dl and transaminases ≤ 3x institution upper limit of normal.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum creatinine ≤ 2 mg/dl with creatinine clearance ≥ 60 ml/min (either calculated or measured).
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Stage I or smoldering myeloma, isolated plasmacytoma, or benign monoclonal gammopathy
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Males and females who do not agree to practice approved methods of birth control for the duration of the study
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Receipt of previous radiation therapy to critical organs exceeding any of the following limits: kidney 500 cGy, liver 1000 cGy, lungs 500 cGy
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and represents for malaise, weakness, and generalized body aching.
